code:
-spec min_sum(Nums1 :: [integer()], Nums2 :: [integer()]) -> integer().
min_sum(Nums1, Nums2) ->
    Zeroes1 = length([X || X <- Nums1, X == 0]),
    Zeroes2 = length([X || X <- Nums2, X == 0]),
    Sum1 = lists:sum(Nums1),
    Sum2 = lists:sum(Nums2),
    Diff = abs(Sum1 - Sum2),
    if
        Zeroes1 > 0 andalso Zeroes2 > 0 ->
            max(Sum1, Sum2) + max(Zeroes1, Zeroes2);
        Zeroes1 > 0 ->
            if Diff rem Zeroes1 == 0 -> Sum1 + Diff div Zeroes1; true -> -1 end;
        Zeroes2 > 0 ->
            if Diff rem Zeroes2 == 0 -> Sum2 + Diff div Zeroes2; true -> -1 end;
        true ->
            if Sum1 == Sum2 -> Sum1; true -> -1 end
    end.
